AbortAgentCruiseDialingCampaign.document: If you want to stop running agent's individual auto task, then call AbortAgentCruiseDialingCampaign to terminate.
AbortAgentCruiseDialingCampaign.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ccc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: AbortAgentCruiseDialingCampaign
<Common request parameters>

{
    "SdkAppId": 1400000000,
    "CampaignId": 2569
}
AbortAgentCruiseDialingCampaign.title: Abort Agent Cruise Dialing Campaign

AbortPredictiveDialingCampaign.document: This example shows you how to stop the Predictive Dialing Campaign
AbortPredictiveDialingCampaign.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ccc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: AbortPredictiveDialingCampaign
<Common request parameters>
{
    "SdkAppId": 1400000000,
    "CampaignId": 2569
}
AbortPredictiveDialingCampaign.title: Stopping Predictive Outbound Call Task

    "SkillGroupIds": [
        1,
        2,
        3
    ],
    "SdkAppId": 1400000000
}
BindNumberCallOutSkillGroup.title: Binding Number and Skill Group

BindStaffSkillGroupList.title: Bind Agent to Skill Group Example

Host: ccc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateAdminURL
<Common request parameters>
{
    "SdkAppId": 1400000000,
    "SeatUserId": "foo@tencent.com"
}
CreateAdminURL.title: Create Management Panel Login

CreateAgentCruiseDialingCampaign.document: This is an example shows how to create an individual auto dialing campaign for agent
CreateAgentCruiseDialingCampaign.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ccc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateAgentCruiseDialingCampaign
<Common request parameters>

{
    "SdkAppId": 1400000000,
    "Name": "New energy SUV recommendation",
    "Callees": [
        "+8613012345678",
        "+8613012345679",
        "+8613012345670"
    ],
    "Callers": [
        "0086075586013388"
    ],
    "Agent": "foo@tencent.com",
    "ConcurrencyNumber": 3,
    "CallOrder": 0,
    "StartTime": 1708483433,
    "EndTime": 1708485433
}
CreateAgentCruiseDialingCampaign.title: Create Agent Cruise Dialing Campaign

CreateAutoCalloutTask.document: This example shows you how to create task
CreateAutoCalloutTask.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ccc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateAutoCalloutTask
<Common request parameters>
{
    "SdkAppId": 1400123455,
    "NotBefore": 1642500621,
    "Callees": [
        "008613012345678"
    ],
    "Callers": [
        "008602012345678"
    ],
    "IvrId": 8
}
CreateAutoCalloutTask.title: Creating Task

CreateCallOutSession.document: This example shows you how to trigger outbound calls through this API in the backend, without loading the front-end SDK. Currently, only outbound call back through the mobile end (first dialing the customer service mobile phone) is supported, and make sure that the addition of outbound call allowlist has been applied and passed.
CreateCallOutSession.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ccc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateCallOutSession
<Common request parameters>
{
    "IsForceUseMobile": "true",
    "Callee": "008612300000000",
    "UUI": "fooandbar",
    "UserId": "FooOrBar@tencent.com",
    "SdkAppId": 1400000000
}
CreateCallOutSession.title: Calling Outbound Call API

        "+8613012345670"
    ],
    "Callers": [
        "0086075586013388"
    ],
    "CallOrder": 0,
    "SkillGroupId": 255,
    "IVRId": 4600,
    "Priority": 3,
    "ExpectedAbandonRate": 10,
    "RetryTimes": 1,
    "RetryInterval": 1800,
    "StartTime": 1708483433,
    "EndTime": 1708485433
}
CreatePredictiveDialingCampaign.title: Creating Predictive Outbound Call Task
